demos.name: RF
demos.description: The RF Toolbox is a collection of MATLAB® functions and objects for RF data manipulation and visualization, and frequency domain analysis of RF circuits and networks. It includes functions for converting between various network parameters, reading and writing RF data files, and visualizing RF data in MATLAB. The RF Toolbox can read and write network parameters in Touchstone format. It can plot the data on a Smith® chart, a polar plane, or an X-Y plane. The RF Toolbox also has built-in RF circuit objects for creating and analyzing various circuits and networks. These include transmission lines, lumped RLC circuits, amplifiers, cascaded networks, series networks, parallel networks, and hybrid networks.
